/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the street below. The street itself is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. A red car is parked on the side of the road, adding a pop of color to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. The image is taken from a low angle, making the viewer feel as if they are standing right there on the street, looking up at the sky.
